alert.note: Alert for Henry; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Stokes, Rockingham, west central Caswell, southwestern Pittsylvania and southeastern Henry Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sandy Level to 6 miles north of Kernersville. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eden... Reidsville... Wentworth... Mayodan... Madison... Bethel... and Stoneville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
